title: Portfolio Website
body: This project is the website in which you are currently using. Used to demonstrate my programming ability and provide ways to contact me.
contentHTML:
All About Me

What Am I Doing?

I am a aspiring full stack developer currently residing on the Gold Coast, Australia. I am currently studying Computer Science at Griffith University and am set to graduate in August of 2022.

My current field-related work experience is limited as it stands, but I am always looking for opportunities to expand my network within the field and my technical abilities. I am currently working an internship at IBM Gold Coast, which is set to run for 3 months.

What are my plans?
